verses.text: \w And|strong="H4428"\w* Benadad, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*, \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w together|strong="H6908"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w host|strong="H2426"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w there|strong="H5927"\w* \w were|strong="H4428"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w going|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* besieged \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w*, \w sending|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Achab \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*,

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith Benadad: Thy \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* mine: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy goodliest \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* mine.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: According \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w O|strong="H0589"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* thine, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w came|strong="H0413"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith Benadad, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* unto thee: Thy \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w Tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w therefore|strong="H1961"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w same|strong="H0853"\w* hour \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w search|strong="H2664"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* pleaseth \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Mark, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* layeth snares \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* nay.

\w And|strong="H8085"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ancients, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: Hearken \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w consent|strong="H0014"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*.

Wherefore \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Benadad: \w Tell|strong="H0559"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou didst \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w*, \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* messengers returning \w brought|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w word|strong="H0559"\w*. \w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Such|strong="H0834"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w such|strong="H0834"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w add|strong="H3254"\w*, \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* suffice \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w handfuls|strong="H8168"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w follow|strong="H7272"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* answering, \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Tell|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w girded|strong="H2296"\w* \w boast|strong="H1984"\w* himself \w as|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* ungirded.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* Benadad \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w drinking|strong="H8354"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* pavilions, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*: Beset \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* beset \w it|strong="H7760"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w coming|strong="H2009"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Achab \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: Hast thou \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* exceeding \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou mayest \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Achab \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w By|strong="H3068"\w* \w whom|strong="H4310"\w*? \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w By|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w begin|strong="H0631"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w fight|strong="H4421"\w*? \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Thou.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H0310"\w* \w mustered|strong="H6485"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0310"\w* found \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w number|strong="H6485"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thirty-two: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0310"\w* \w mustered|strong="H6485"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*:

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H1931"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w noon|strong="H6672"\w*. \w But|strong="H4428"\w* Benadad \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w drinking|strong="H8354"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3318"\w* \w pavilion|strong="H5521"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w with|strong="H8147"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w were|strong="H4428"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w help|strong="H5826"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w*. \w And|strong="H7971"\w* Benadad \w sent|strong="H7971"\w*. \w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: There \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3318"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Whether|strong="H0518"\w* \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w take|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*: \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w whether|strong="H0518"\w* \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w fight|strong="H4421"\w*, \w take|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*.

\w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H5288"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* rest \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w followed|strong="H0310"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w came|strong="H0376"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Syrians \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*. \w And|strong="H3478"\w* Benadad \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w away|strong="H5127"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w horseback|strong="H5483"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*.

\w But|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w going|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* overthrew \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Syrians \w with|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H5221"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4347"\w*.

(\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w coming|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Go|strong="H5927"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w strengthen|strong="H2388"\w* thyself, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* thou dost: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w next|strong="H5921"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thee.)
